channel.title: Say all command
channel.description: how do i add a command that makes everybody say something? for example, All hail pie!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 25, 2009, 12:40:10 pm[/size][hr]plz help[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 25, 2009, 12:51:46 pm[/size][hr]plz help me

item.title: Say all command
item.dc:creator: @luster_xg luster xg
item.description:
@luster_xg wrote:

It wont work. [code]}

if(command.startsWith(“hail”) && playerRights > 2){
hail();
}[/code]

} public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "All Hail Pie!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }
did i do anything wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Say all command
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“watch n lern, post:2, topic:310545”]add this to your commands list:

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights > 2){ hail(); }

and add this public void:

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "All Hail Pie!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } [/quote]

You need to spoonfeed noobs,

@Luster xg in client.java search Public void.

Read full topic

Thanks dude[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 25, 2009, 08:21:33 pm[/size][hr]sorry for being a noob but do where i find the public void file? is it in the commands file? and do i compile the server after doing the changes?

item.title: Say all command
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

add this to your commands list:

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights > 2){ hail(); }

and add this public void:

public void hail()
   {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
        client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) {
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client
castOn.plrText = "All Hail Pie!";
castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY);
castOn.setAnimation(1651);
castOn.updateRequired = true;
castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
       }
}
}

Read full topic
